attributes.action: to give comnwealth  partners that are married to serving soliders the same right as UK  army wifes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
iam from canada and  when my hubby goes away i do not recive the same as the britesh wifes  no flight home  and if my family get sick i have to make my way home i get no flight home this is the same for all comnwealth partners we support our men just like the outher partners do   so we all should be treated the same and have the same right 
flight home when the serving soilder is on tour for 6mounth
compassionate  leav travel  
not just back to the uk but to our home country where the person  is that is sick . UK wives get this but if  i want to go home when my parteners is away i would have to pay but the UK wives get 2 free flight home when there parteners is on op tour   we want the same right

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
